name: RhythmSlinger
description:
RhythmSlinger is a kinetic trick-based VR rhythm shooter that generates fast-paced levels from any audio track.

EASY TO LEARN, NEAR IMPOSSIBLE TO MASTER
⦿ Shoot blue Beatspheres as their beats land
⦿ Kick back your weapon as you hit an orange Coilsphere to "recoil" with a spin
⦿ Charge your pistol with a physical trick before hitting white Trickspheres



FAST-PACED GAMEPLAY FROM ANY .MP3
⦿ Levels are generated automagically from any .mp3 file - shoot to your favorite music!
⦿ 20 tracks included to get started

SEVEN STYLISH TRICK-PISTOLS
⦿ Perform tricks unique to each gun using physical motions
⦿ Toss, whirl, floor-bounce, levitate, quickdraw, blade-throw, and reflect your way to mastery
⦿ Hold different guns in each hand for an extra challenge



CUSTOMIZABLE
⦿ 6 difficulties from Easy to Impossible
⦿ 6 challenging gameplay modifiers
⦿ 3 visual color schemes
